attributes.action: Let teenagers wear the clothes they like and uniforms are band !
attributes.additional_details: Some teens may feel trapped and want to wear there own clothes and wearing school uniforms might make them feel self conscious so by giving teenagers a chance to look forward to showing of there dress sense will help all teens be happy !
attributes.background: In school teenagers want to feel comfortable in what they wear and having a school skirt on and short/trousers that are uncomfortable can be difficult stop this and vote now to make  teenagers feel comfortable and be able to look forward and embracing there dress sense !!
